item.description:
Hello, how are you?
I decided to organize the multi-group networking opportunity which follows.
There will be many groups there. Discover the what, when, where and why.
This will be a very large joint event. :)


Hello, how are you?

Who else likes to meet new people?
Who else wants wants to build their network?
Who else enjoys a hot breakfast and a hot coffee or tea?
Who else likes discover cute new cafes and places to hang out?
Sometimes in the summer we will buy a coffee and walk to the nearby park. :)

Where we will be meeting?
Discovering what everybody else is saying about the Bakery:
http://www.yelp.com/b...

This celebration will fill up quickly. The group size will be small (b/c the cafe has very limited amounts of seats and to make it more intimate).

There will be a variety of groups here. Each with only 5 people.

Huge group: http://www.BostonVolu...

You love networking: http://www.meetup.com...

You love tennis: http://www.meetup.com...

Will fill up immediately. RSVP now (change later if necessary).
Thank you for reading, you're already half way there.

See you soon!
Josh

P.S. Free Wi-Fi

P.P.S. B/c there is HUGE demand (two days after posting the event we have ten people on the waiting list!) I opened it up to 3 more people. I can't open it up for more b/c of the very limited amount of seating. If there is still a spot open please RSVP through one of the other groups
http://www.BostonVolu...
or
http://www.meetup.com...
or
http://www.meetup.com...

P.S. This will be a HUGE networking celebration with many many people there. RSVP now as there are few seats left!


Free Wi-Fi
item.name: What's the best networking opportunity? Discover what...
